div.sent: Paper is a vital thing in our lives.
The use of paper is unavoidable in every sphere of life.
The paper signifies the development of a civilization.
As time is passing, the consumption of papers is increasing in our day to day lives.
There are different papers for different tasks.
They are of different kinds- hard, soft, thick, thin, white and coloured papers, It is difficult to specify them.
Thousand of useful things are made of these papers, Decoration of houses, festivals, functions, all can be done with papers.
Any kind of art with these papers gives us pleasure.
If we could continue doing these delightful works then life would be more pleasant.
If you want to do any work of art, it is necessary to learn the art and practice it to be skilled.
Let us make a few crafts with papers.
